project_name: SuperAdmin Panel - Rent A Car SaaS

design_philosophy.visual_style: Deep Midnight Blue backgrounds for impact, crisp white/grey for data. High-contrast Orange accents for conversion.
design_philosophy.theme_strategy: Hybrid. Dark Mode for Hero/Impact sections. Light Mode for Pricing/Features/Forms to ensure readability and trust.

usage_rules.headings: Bold (700) or ExtraBold (800). Tight tracking (-0.02em). Use for H1-H3.
usage_rules.body: Regular (400) for long text. Medium (500) for UI labels.
usage_rules.buttons: SemiBold (600). Uppercase optional for primary CTAs.

gradients.text_gradient: bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-white via-slate-200 to-slate-400

buttons.primary: bg-accent hover:bg-accent/90 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-lg font-semibold shadow-lg shadow-orange-500/20 transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-white/10 hover:bg-white/20 text-white border border-white/10 rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-lg font-medium backdrop-blur-sm transition-all
buttons.outline: border-2 border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:border-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-full px-6 py-3 transition-all

cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-3xl bg-slate-50 hover:bg-white border border-slate-200 p-8 transition-all hover:shadow-xl hover:shadow-slate-200/50
cards.pricing: relative flex flex-col p-8 rounded-3xl border border-slate-200 bg-white shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-2
cards.pricing_featured: relative flex flex-col p-8 rounded-3xl border border-orange-500/30 bg-slate-900 text-white shadow-2xl shadow-orange-500/10 scale-105 z-10

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-white px-4 text-slate-900 focus:border-orange-500 focus:ring-orange-500/20

hero_bg.usage: Hero Section Background with heavy dark overlay (bg-slate-950/80)

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: Run 'npm install lucide-react framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot @radix-ui/react-accordion @radix-ui/react-dialog @radix-ui/react-label @radix-ui/react-select @radix-ui/react-switch'.
2. FONT SETUP: Add 'Outfit' and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' from Google Fonts to index.css.
3. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js to include the new colors (slate-900 as primary, orange-500 as accent) and fonts.
4. COMPONENT STRATEGY: Build the Landing Page as a single page with scroll sections (Hero -> Features -> Pricing -> Testimonials -> FAQ -> Contact).
5. MULTI-LANGUAGE: Create a simple 'LanguageSelector' component in the Navbar. Mock the translation logic for now (just show the UI).
6. PRICING: Implement the 'Tracing Beam' effect on the pricing cards using framer-motion.
7. FORMS: Use Shadcn UI components for the 'Demo Request' form. Ensure validation is visible.
8. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all text on the dark hero section has sufficient contrast. Use 'data-testid' on all interactive elements.

do_not: Do NOT use generic 'Inter' font for headings.
Do NOT use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-950 (#020617).
Do NOT make the design too 'flat'. Use subtle borders and shadows.
Do NOT forget mobile responsiveness. Stack grids on mobile.
must_do: MUST use the provided image URLs.
MUST implement hover states for all buttons and cards.
MUST use 'framer-motion' for smooth entrance animations (fade-up).
MUST keep the 'Rent A Car' context in mind (professional, reliable).
